guide: You will passively get progress
in this by just having a pet
equipped all time.
To get easy progress in this do
contests like Wheat, Potato, Carrot
or Mushroom as those are easy
Bronze or Silver Medals to get.
You can get easy contribution for
this by breaking some Wheat in the Hub.
If you want faster contribution,
make a Sugar Cane farm in your Garden.
Once you acquire a Void Sword and a decent
armor like Ender or Glacite this should be
fairly easy to do.
You will need Combat 12 for this.
Getting a Void Sword and Ender Armor
will make progress in this easier.
You can find Relic Coordinates in Skytils
or the Wiki. You will need Ender Pearls
to reach some of them.
Farm some Wheat in the Hub.
Craft some easy minions while also getting
those that will help with this Bingo.
Unlock Clay Minions by fishing in the Hub
in the Fishermans Pond. Then use the Clay Trade
to get enough Clay for minions.
Give them the best fuel and storage you
have access to. Using Compactors is strongly
recommended. Remember to collect in time.
To help with this, try to make bigger crafts
by hand for Carpentry levels.
Also do your daily experiments and make sure
to have a pet active at all times
(any pet works, even level 100).
This requires Catacombs Level 1 and
a completion of the previous floor.
You may need help from party finder
or friends for this.
Fish with an Enchanted Chum Rod in the Rain
in the Park. Use the best bait you can.
Unlock Chicken Minions by killing Chickens
in the Barn and craft as many minions as you can.
Give them the best fuel and storage you
have access to.
Remember to collect in time.

note: Obtain a Mediocre Ring of Love
guide: Follow the Romero Questline until you
get this. You will only need
1 Yellow Rock, 15 poppies and 64 Emerald.
Optimal tool:
Golden Axe with Efficiency 5
Reforges: Double-Bit or Lush
Get Haste 3 from a splash to instamine wood
Forage in the Dark Thicket in the Park.
Place as many minions as you can,
give them a medium storage and the best fuel
you can. Collect them in time.
Get yourself a splash, equip a Bingo Pet
and get the cake buff by eating the cakes
on owocato's, xMeru's or prtl's island.
If this doesn't finish it, get a Void Sword (200k) in the End
and hold it while some Ender Armor and/or Equipment.
Wear armor enchanted with Growth 5
(Enchanting Level 5), preferably Ender Armor
while you're in The End or Mushroom Armor
during the night.
Applying Growth 5 costs 50 Levels each.
If you still struggle, reforge your
armor to Titanic.
Talk to the Blacksmith in the Hub
and gamble Reforges on an armor piece
until you get the Titanic Reforge.
You might need to bring some money for this.
List of more than 12 talismans:
Buy all 6 Talismans for 26k from the Adventurer in The Hub
Collection Talismans:
Farming Talisman, Vaccine Talisman,
Gravity Talisman, Talisman of Coins, Magnetic Talisman,
Wood Affinity Talisman, Speed Talisman, Potion Affinity Talisman
Other:
Archaeologists Compass, Mediocre Ring of Love, King Talisman,
Campfire Initiate Badge, Cat Talisman, Spider Talisman,
Don't forget to take the 4 Bonus accessory bag slots from
the Redstone Miner, he needs 1920 Redstone in total.
You will get some progress for this
by working on other goals.
The easiest to go for are:
Mushroom, Oak Wood, Bone,
Sand, Wheat, Iron and Seeds.
You can save all your Dark Oak Wood
to craft a t11 Minion from this (164k Wood)
or go for something quick like a Wheat Minion.
Mine Ender Nodes in the End,
fish one up while going for Dolphin,
or get some from the Experimentation Table.

note: Find 3 Pairs in the Experimentation Table
guide: Get Enchanting Level 10 and play
the first tier in the Experimentation Table.
Use an Enchanted Chum Rod in the Rain
in the Park and use the best bait you can.
Look for a mob with a purple name
and kill it.
